price: Ka ce: "Abin da na rõƙe ku na wani sakamako, to, amfãninsa nãku ne. Ijãrata ba ta zama ba fãce daga Allah, kuma shi Ma shadai ne a kan dukan kõme."
arabic: قُلۡ مَا سَأَلۡتُكُم مِّنۡ أَجۡرٖ فَهُوَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul mā sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum in ajriya illā ʿalā al-lahi wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
